summary: Federal employees who are whistleblowers can help fight fraud, waste, and abuse, so laws protect them from retaliation, such as demotion and firing. We're looking into whistleblower retaliation cases at the Department of Veterans Affairs. This testimony covers our prior and ongoing work. Amid an uptick in all cases reported to the VA, whistleblower retaliation cases have increased from 577 in FY 2020 to 736...
title: VA Whistleblowers: Retaliation Claim Investigations and Settlement Agreements [Reissued with revisions on Oct. 27, 2023]
